generated_body: If you click on the article titled "What Happens When a Plane Collides with a Flock of Birds?", you are likely to read about the potential consequences and technical responses involved in bird strikes. Additionally, it could explore the impact on flight safety and how wildlife management practices aim to reduce these occurrences around airports.
